title: Vaccine Science Archives
cleaned_text: This panel is composed of parents of those who have experienced ‘new medical conditions’ after HPV vaccine administration. They will each briefly outline what happened to their children followed by the treatments they have used. Which ones were successful? Which ones were not successful?
